member.name: TCITEMHEADERA
member.summary: Specifies or receives the attributes of a tab. It is used with the TCM_INSERTITEM, TCM_GETITEM, and TCM_SETITEM messages. This structure supersedes theTC_ITEMHEADER structure.

summary.para: Value that specifies which members to retrieve or set. This member can be a combination of the following values:

listheader.description: The string pointed to by pszText will be displayed in the direction opposite to the text in the parent window.

member.name: TCITEMHEADERA.pszText
member.summary: Address of a null-terminated string that contains the tab text if item information is being set. If item information is being retrieved, this member specifies the address of the buffer that receives the tab text.

member.name: TCITEMHEADERA.cchTextMax
member.summary: Size of the buffer pointed to by the pszText member. If the structure is not receiving information, this member is ignored.

member.name: TCITEMHEADERA.iImage
member.summary: Index into the tab control's image list, or -1 if there is no image for the tab.

member.name: TCITEMHEADERA

member.summary: Address of a null-terminated string that contains the tab text if item information is being set. If item information is being retrieved, this member specifies the address of the buffer that receives the tab text.
